QuestData.Title: The Lord of the Gordunni
QuestData.Description: Witch Lord Morkurk is the leader of the Gordunni. He's the one that set up the Iron Horde trade and, even worse, my former boss gave him one of my best maces!$b$bWe got to get my mace back! I mean... we need to kill him to secure the jovite for your arsenal!$b$bMorkurk is an accomplished mage so you better be prepared. Here, take the rocket pack and use it if you need to dodge an attack quickly or something.$b$bAlso, if you happen to find my mace I'd like to get it back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Witch Lord Morkurk within Gordal Fortress and obtain "Fury of the Forge".
QuestData.RewardText: Fine work commander! Your combat skills are clearly second to none. I am honored to be your armorer!$b$bLet's get back to the outpost so we can take stock of our new inventory. I saved a few flares to call us in a ride back.
